snippet: Cary Ann Hearst and Michael Trent, the married couple who make up this band, will perform at the Music Hall of Williamsburg and the Bowery Ballroom....
lead_paragraph: Cary Ann Hearst and Michael Trent, the married couple who make up this band, will perform at the Music Hall of Williamsburg and the Bowery Ballroom.

headline.main: Shovels & Rope, Visiting New York With a Scrappy New Album
headline.print_headline: Pop; Telling Stories in Scrappy Songs
